paperAbstract: The <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="inline-block"><msup><mi>K</mi><mi>Ï€</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>8</mn><mo>âˆ’</mo></msup></math> isomeric states and rotational bands in the even-even ğ‘=150 isotones with 94â©½ğ‘â©½104 are investigated by the cranked shell model (CSM) with pairing correlations treated by the particle-number-conserving (PNC) method.
